title: Ananda naTanam ADinAL
sahitya:
Ananda naTanam AdinAL saccidAnanda naTanam AdinAL parAshakti naTanam AdinAL


anupallavi

  vAnum bhuviyum vaNangi magizhndiDa jnAna veLiyinil vINai Om Om ena


caraNam 1    panca bhUtangal muzhanga guNangaL pAindu tALam vazhanga
Anju tozhilum tulanga kAlam adhira bhuvigal kulunga 
tanjam tanjam enrul anbar muraiyiDat-tantAm tantAm tAkiTa takadhIm ena
    caraNam 2    kali arakkargaL vizha mINDum krta yuga dEvar vAzha-polivu nalangal shUzha
 mangalap-pudiya vAzhkkai ponga shalippillAmal sadAshivanuDan
tadingiNatOm tadingiNatOm taLAngu tarikiTatOm ena
